item.title: Iranian group used ChatGPT to try to influence US election, OpenAI says
item.description:
AI company bans accounts and says operation did not appear to have meaningful audience engagement

OpenAI said on Friday it had taken down accounts of an Iranian group for using its ChatGPT chatbot to generate content meant for influencing the US presidential election and other issues.

The operation, identified as Storm-2035, used ChatGPT to generate content focused on topics such as commentary on the candidates on both sides in the US elections, the conflict in Gaza and Israelâ€™s presence at the Olympic Games and then shared it via social media accounts and websites, Open AI said.

Continue reading...
